channel.title: Menu on start up *help needed*
channel.description:
I have seen many server that when you logg in you have like a purpilish screen saying Server name at the top and a close button to the right Server created by :(ownersname) And then near the bottem it says Updates forums and stuff like that
When on this on start up you can not walk any where you can see your character ect ect
Please help and give me a code :(

@jac wrote:

… Dude all i need to know is where to put it ffs when i put it where you told me to put it freekin screwed my server up

Read full topic

item.title: Menu on start up *help needed*
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

I’ll get help off someone else man

One of my servers has this, yet i odnt know what to do to add it to my new server

{ String owner = "Jac"; String LU = "Elemental Armor"; String Rep = ""+reputation; sendQuest("~~~ Sickscape ~~~", 15950); sendQuest("", 15960); sendQuest("", 15961); sendQuest("Server created by - Jac", 15959); sendQuest("sickscape.piczo.com", 15951); sendQuest("Reputation: @whi@"+Rep, 15952); sendQuest("Latest Update - Check webite", 15953); sendQuest("Enjoy the server!", 15954); sendQuest("", 15955); sendQuest("", 15956); sendQuest("", 15957); sendQuest("", 15958);

showInterface(15944);
}

I just need to know how to make it pop up when people logg in

Read full topic

item.title: Menu on start up *help needed*
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

Yea here it is:

public void MainHelpMenu()
	{
sendQuest("", 15950);
sendQuest("", 15959);
sendQuest("", 15960);
sendQuest("", 15961);
sendQuest("", 15951);
sendQuest("", 15952);
sendQuest("", 15953);
sendQuest("", 15954);
sendQuest("", 15955);
sendQuest("", 15956);
sendQuest("", 15957);
sendQuest("", 15958);
showInterface(15944);
}

Read full topic
